content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend told me to hurry and come out on our deck. i looked to my right and saw this very long line of red lights. it ran from in front of me and over the roof of the neighbor.  i didn't see the full length off it they were short of flashing and then some would turn white just for a second. the one at the end nearest me turned white and i caught myself musty starting at the one light.  this thing was huge and didn't make one single sound.  it wasn't that high either. 
i
content.summary: Saw a line of at least 50 red lights didn't make on sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for a cigarette around 0145 in a small alcove against my apartment building. i noticed the motion censor light in the 1st floor stairwell come on and, assuming a resident to be coming outside, i moved around the dumpster on the edge of our building and into the parking lot. when i looked back, i realized that no one seemed to be in the stairwell as the other three stories of motion-lights remained off.

for some reason i began to feel inexplicably spooked, frightened almost, in the pit of my stomach (whether due to this light coming on or otherwise), and my instincts told me to look up and see if there was anything unusual in the sky. i studied the stars for some twenty seconds before movement caught my eye and i noticed an airplane almost directly above me headed nw toward the mountains on a flightpath i've become familiar with on my breaks. as i looked at the plane i realized i could faintly hear it, a noise that fit it's altitude. it wasn't particularly low (high enough to be unnoticeably quiet at first) but was clearly still ascending to a cruising altitude. 

as i looked at this plane, movement caught my eye to the south, and i noticed what i initially thought was a flock of birds moving through the night sky. but as my eyes adjusted, i realized that in fact it was five or six dim lights, equidistant, (aspirin sized, as you offered above), gliding in perfect silence. these lights were very distinctly lower than the airplane that was still moving to the nw far above (the airplane sound in no way covered up or hindered any sense of a noise i'd have heard from this object). though i'm a terrible judge of specific distance (especially at night with no point of reference), it was clear that they were far closer than the plane, but by no means close enough to scrape the rooftop if you know what i mean. 

within about three seconds, the lights had covered some 40 degrees of the sky above me, and disappeared over my 4-story apartment building. i jogged some twenty feet to the neighbor's lot and saw the lights fading into the sky above the city, becoming too small and lost in the light pollution. this second glimpse lasted barely a second or two. but enough to confirm they hadn't vanished in the time i didn't have eyes on them.
content.summary: Five or six lights in a straight line gliding ne in total silence, between treetop and 500 ft.

content.detailedDescription: On nov. 26 at 1:36am, in phoenix, right off of the i 17 and carefree hwy. i was on 33rd ave between gavin prkwy and cloud rd. i was on my skateboard heading south on 33rd ave,(i couldn't sleep so i decided to go ride my skateboard around the neighborhood), as i was skating down 33rd ave,just past the elementary school, i happen to look over my shoulder to see if any cars were coming, i noticed a really bright yellowish orange light that seemed to be getting brighter and a bigger, this was the second time i see this same object, the first time i notice it i didn't have my phone with me and it was about a week or may be just a couple days prior to this, i noticed it the first time because of how bright the light was and how it was glowing from yellow to orange and didn't have any blinking lights like a plane or helicopter, just like this night.. so as i started recording( i'm still on my skateboard, but now im slowly moving towards the north, hence the shaky video). as im trying to focus my camera and zoom in i notice that as i'm zooming in it appears to be rotating around two center white lights(but for some reason on the video you can see the rotation) as im recording i notice that it was way bigger and brighter then a plane,helicopter and there was no blinking lights and if you your able to slow it down and zoom in some more(which is why i attached the original recording and a edited slowed down copy), it apears to have something or someone moving in between the two bright white lights in the center of the yellow-orange glow, it even apears to look over its shoulder as if he sees or hears something in my direction, looks as if it's moving it's arms from one side to the other or possibly moving controls. but moving fast and rushed almost as if he is frantic and in a hurry ,(not sure why i think that, but that was the feeling i got after i watched the video at home). around the 18 or20 sec mark its glow gets brighter and brighter from bright yellowish orange to bright orange glow and then turns into a ball of bright blue/then white light that encompasses the whole thing, but right before it turns to the white light and darts off in a west/north direction, you can see something being lifted or beemed up towards the  light, looks like something that appears to be moving in fish like movement swimming straight up to the light but right before it reached the craft , the lights goes from blue to bright white in a flash and darts off in a west direction and then the object falls back down to earth... and then with in a few seconds after the light disappears you can see a plane coming directly over and through the path of where the craft was b4 it disappeared. probably why it took off so fast and why they didn't stick around for the object to get to them...  i'm not sure what i'm suppose to do with this recording. i feel there may be more information that i may be missing because im not able to edit it properly. possibly more than one person/ thing flying it, not sure but i'm hoping you can find out and let me know.. also im curious to know what that object was that fell after it took off and disappeared...
content.summary: Approx. 22sec.Of a yelliow-orange object/no structure, ascending/then hovering,  see  someone/or thing at controls/see movement.Inside. b4 it takes off n2 a blue/white light, small object is ascending towards the light but falls as it took off.

content.detailedDescription:
After leaving a grocery store and while loading groceries into my car, i heard a woman shopper ask, "what are those?"  i followed her pointing arm and saw 4 lights very close together coming our direction from the sw at a moderate velocity. (see photo) as we watched, the objects separated, slowed, and then hovered in a wide arc formation nearly at our zenith. while hovering, all four varied in intensity - high and low but not in sync. at the time of the second picture, the light on the far right of the arc appeared to dim much more than the others or perhaps move away from us while the others remained. after 7 minutes, the two on the outside of the arc departed to the north. of the center two, one departed south and the other departed east; again at a slow to moderate speed. all four remained in sight until lost behind buildings and other horizon blockage. i asked the woman observer if she would be willing to file a report. she absolutely declined.  as an observer i did not identify myself as a field investigator to her nor did i affect any form of action other than filing this report in case someone else filed a supporting observation.

as solid as the lights appeared, there is a possibility that they were merely ice crystal reflections from the sun. i am not, however, sure how to explain their relative motions nor how one passed in front of two others when it departed.

in the second picture there appears to be two dimmer lights below the two center lights in the arc.  neither those nor any other lights or craft of any description were noticed at the time of the observation.

absolutely no alterations have been done to the digital photographs other than reduction in size for transmission. the photos were taken on an android moto cell phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 lights approached from sw, separated, hovered, 2 departed north, 1 departed south, 1 departed east.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing a patrol in castle rock and at 2055 i noticed a string of red lights (about 10-15) moving north to northeast. they were all in a straight line pulsating an orange light. in the middle there was an white light. almost like a yellowish light strobing in a random pattern.  the object was also at a very strange angle looking to be at close to a 45 degree. the object seemed to be over 350 feet in length side to side but very slim too to bottom only looking to be about 30 feet judging by the light. by judging the direction of the objects flight it would have had to come over the back of the property i an working at. the object had made no noise.  the object was moving very slow it seemed like due to the time it took to disappear over the horizon.
content.summary: 10-15 red lights in a straight line at a 45 angle

content.detailedDescription: String of silent sequentially blinking red lights moving east to west over boulder. took video which failed to capture the intense red. but showed the lights blinking in an odd pattern. no sound (other than the train passing by). looked like they may have been connected as they maintained a reasonably rigid pattern.
content.summary: string of slowly moving bright red lights east to west directly over steel yards neighborhood in boulder co. deep red over junction place.

content.detailedDescription:
I immediately woke up quickly at 1:54 am. i thought it was morning and
looked out my bedroom window and it was daylight outside and cloudy. i came in the kitchen to get some coffee and realized it was 1:54 am.
content.summary: I saw a cloudy twightlight morning at 1:54 am

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8:00 pm, on december 9, 2017 my husband was coming home from work and called me to tell me to go outside and look at the lights in the sky above our property. when i went out i observed at least 18 -20 bright red lights.  the lights were all an equal distance apart and were going off/on in a right to left order. the first light was situated over our pole barn and the last light i could see was over our neighbors property, at least a 1/4 mile away. the lights were traveling at a north-western direction when i first started observing them, but then started moving west. the object moved to the west until it was out of my sight. the object was flying low to the ground (500 -600 hundred feet).

tonight is clear and stars are out, and the object covered the stars as it moved.  it moved very slowly and at times seemed to actually pause in the sky.  there was absolutely no sound, but our dogs were barking like crazy (they were not outside but in the house).

i wanted others to view the objects so i contacted my neighbor. she witnessed the exact same thing.  i also called the jackson county sheriffs department and they dispatched a deputy. the deputy also witnessed the lights and actually tried to follow them.  i got on facebook and there was a flurry of conversations regarding the lights.
content.summary: 20 + bright red lights approximately 1/4 mile wide.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home . saw what looked 2 b 10 planes flying in a row. dec 10 8 oclock pm.
content.summary: Looked like 10 jets in a row. t

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed lights in the sky as i got out of truck
they seemed several thousand feet in altitude
and were approaching from the west. steadily
blinking both red and white lights covering 1/3 of
the entire sky. slowly moved directly east and
faded from sight. noise was a muffled hum from a 
far distance, not very loud. lights distance from
each other remained constant making them 
appear as one large object. 

i ran into our house and alerted my wife to
come out and look. we both observed the ufo.
content.summary: 30ish blinking red and white lights in a zigzag pattern moving from west to east

content.detailedDescription: I had recently rescued a dog from the local shelter a couple months earlier. i was still housebreaking him and would take him outside in very early morning hours when it was still dark. on this occasion, approximately 5 am, i had taken him outside across the street in front of my house and we were standing by the corner, not far from street light. i looked up toward the sky in the north and noticed a large halo of light partially obscured by the tree-tops of the redwoods behind my neighbors house. i remember thinking that i've never noticed the moon in that direction before. i then noticed the halo of light was moving slowly out of the tree-tops toward me in a path almost directly overhead. as it cleared the tree-tops i was surprised at what was in the center creating the halo of light. at its center was a brilliant, white, inverted cone of light. it wasn't a light fanning out from a source, spreading and diminishing. the cone of light had a definite starting point and a definite ending point along the bottom rim of the cone, almost like it was thicker, or "lipped" around the wide, circular base. the cone of light ended abruptly at its wide base and seemed to have an almost "solid" nature to it. it was the brightest, most brilliant white you can imagine. as far as the angle of the cone, it was like an isosceles triangle. the source of the cone of light was not visible, however there did seem to be a very dim, dark red color from which the pointed end of cone emanated. it was completely silent. i am fairly certain it was less than 500 ft up, more likely 200-300 ft. i was mesmerized by it and watched it for almost 10 minutes until it disappeared in the fog bank toward the ocean. unfortunately, i didn't have my cell with me and didn't want to risk missing it by running in to get it...Although in retrospect, i would've had time. this was almost 2 years ago and i still think about it often.
content.summary: Brilliant white inverted cone of light moved slow, silent, north to south about 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i had just got some candy at the store and was driving through downtown looking at this year's' christmas lights in the park. we were headed back to my house (east) and we were looking at lights in a neighborhood. i was seeing a long strand of red lights over everything slanted diagonally in a negative slope. i was thinking "there isn't a mountain or house here." i truly thought they were christmas lights. then i get my mom to pull over at east parker road and canterberry parkway, parker, colorado. i get out and immediately pull up an app i use for astrophotography on my iphone called nightcap pro camera 9.0. i get it on night mode, boost brightness, and start recording while i gather as much evidence i could. the lights moved over us (and i mean incredibly close) at a slightly positive slope and then began heading sw at a negative slope. the lights were red and blinked. when the red blinked a smaller, dimmer silvery flash occurred. they appeared to radiate one after another from the center. i do remember seeing darkish brownish trails. i knew that i needed to get the best shot i could for evidence. it was eventually so freakishly odd we had to just get home. we were able to see the objects continue out into the horizon where they were so close they looked like an irregular star cluster as they disappeared into the horizon. every time a plane or helicopter flies over me, i can hear it. what's so eerie about these lights is that everything occurred without the slightest of sound. absolute silence.
content.summary: Bright red flashing lights approximately 15-20 at 8:55pm over parker, colorado.

content.detailedDescription: Sometime before 8pm, a string of flashing red and white lights were observed by a friend sitting in the drivers seat of the car. she pointed it out to the rest of us (there were 5 of us total) and we all became immediately confused and began to freak out. we were at a stoplight when this occurred. the driver in the next car lane heard us and began to look out of the window as well. we all attempted to take videos of it but couldn't get anything solid where you could see them clearly. we also have an audio recording of us all describing what we had seen exactly, but we're not sure any of it is good evdidence. the strangest part was that they all seem to be connected. at first they were in a straight diagonal line, then they began to shift into a different shape. we observed them for maybe about 10-15 minutes. we could still see them in the sky, just further away. there were other much bigger lights in the sky as well, but we could clearly tell they were planes, where the other ones we had no idea of what they could possibly be. none of us have ever seen anything like it. i checked the most recent sightings on here as soon as i could and was shocked to see there were similar sightings in our area. it's comforting to know we weren't the only ones who saw it, however we are all still pretty spooked.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: String of blinking red and white lights, hovered, eventually changed direction

content.detailedDescription: I left my home at 9:08 to pick up my son the next town over, as i exited my home i noticed a large object in the sky.   it had 6-10 blinking red lights in a long zig zag pattern that appeared to be hovering over the mtn area near my home.  i ran inside to ask my boyfriend to come witness this phenomena, he looked out and agreed it was unusual, not a plane or helicopter the blinking lights were hovering and to spaced apart.  we didn't make out a shape but ran to the end of the driveway and notice it became smaller as though it was moving away, it was hard to tell but definitely not any craft we have ever seen in our beautiful skies.
content.summary: The sighting was unusual, multiple lights in a long zig zag patter, very large, not a plane, light blinking.

content.detailedDescription: Observed pattern of red, sequentially pulsating lights in sky outside of home.  lights moved slowly from east to western horizon and were arranged veritically in a criss-cross pattern. no sound or other acoustic emission heard.  observed this for approximately 3 to 4 minutes until lights faded into western horizon.  estimated height of object at approximately 500 to 600 feet in vertical length first appearing at about 15 degrees above the horizon.  slow, lumbering type of movement.  no surface apparent, only pattern of vertically stacked lights in criss-crossed patter.
content.summary: Observed patter of 7 to 8 sequentially pulsating lights moving vertically across the night sky in a western direction.

content.detailedDescription: While driving west on beltway 8 near ellington afb at sunset, i noticed a green light hover in the sky, less than 1/2 mile away, for approximately 3 seconds, then it shot to the west horizon at an incredible rate of speed and disappeared at the west horizon. the object reached the horizon in less than two seconds. after a moment, i said "what was that?" my wife said, "you saw it too?". we discussed this at length and have no rational explanation for what we witnessed. its not possible that a jet could have accelerated that quickly and reached the horizon that quickly.
content.summary: Bright green light in sky, went from mid-sky to western horizon in less than 2 seconds

content.detailedDescription: On the way home around 7:58, 8:00pm. watching for deer and notice right in front of us in the sky right above the treeline where these red and white, silver, round, small, lights in a row all going in a pattern around the edge and along the top and bottom all going around in a pattern. it was turning slowly at a tilt, bigger then a house,  very low to the ground,  turning slowly,  going in a e direction. i drove fast down the lane me and my boyfriend watching it. i ran into the house and grabbed my mom to look at it.  she ran out with me and we watched it. no noise at all, the red,  silvers lights where all going in a perfect tilted circle, top and bottom, but the object was translucent, could just see the lights circling top and bottom this huge slow turning no sound thing.  we watched it for 10, 15 mins, slowly changing it's directed to the ne.  we watched tell it was so far away in the dark we couldn't see it anymore.  we never saw it take of just slowly moving away. mom was kinda scared because it was so close, so big, slowly moving away over our field and above the neighbourhood in the dark, 8pm. i went inside the house never knowing if it went back up because it moved to far away to see at night above the treeline still. i tried to take a picture of it on my phone or record it but i couldn't capture it on my cell phone.
content.summary: Red, silver,  patterned lights,  big and round,  tilted,  turning slow, above trees,  moving slow to ne,  e

content.detailedDescription: Saw a string of lights in denver (10-15 lights). appeared to be very high up and moved silently from east to west. flashing red and white lights and they appeared to be connected.
content.summary: String of lights seen moving from east to west. moved silently. appeared to be connected

content.detailedDescription: At least ten bright blinking lights in a solid moving quickly towards the west followed by airplanes. appeared to be lights on something massive, first noticed when driving west. lost sight as it moved further south and buildings restricted the sightline.
content.summary: 10 flashing red lights moving west

content.detailedDescription:
It was a week night around 9pm in either spring or fall of 1978. i am sure of that because it was not hot or cold outside. my co- worker and i were wiring a new 84 lumber in ventura or santa barbra, ca. after we were finished work that day, usually about 5 or 6 pm, we decided to drive down to the beach. we were sitting there in a parking space, in the work truck, overlooking the ocean. it was after sundown and the sky was a crisp and clear twilight blue. there may have been a few stars beginning to show or a moon starting to come up. it was just one of those picturesque night time skies.

there were buildings behind us to the left and an ocean point in front to the right. all of a sudden a light, kind of like a flare lit up on that point. it looked like a roman candle the way it spits out sparks between fire balls. i remember thinking its not the 4th of july what’s going on. that went on for what seemed like a long time for a roman candle not to spit out a ball of fire. then finally it spit one out, then another and another and another. theses balls seemed to go really far into different parts of the sky and they were different colors, red, blue, green and white/silver. they sat there in the sky for a while until the sparks from where they came stopped. then one at a time they started to move to new positions super-fast and then stop abruptly. they continued to do this sort of dance changing direction every time they would move and they would take turns moving.

we were speechless as we watched this dance go on for probably for a minute or two.  then each one, one at a time flew directly into the white/silver one and the white/silver one  flew in a circular pattern very fast and took off straight up and out of sight in the blink of an eye.

i still get goose bumps when i think about what we saw. i have no doubt that there are ufo’s out there but i try to keep it to myself. this was also way before the movie, close encounters, but that is almost exactly what these balls of light looked like only a bit further away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright colored objects shot into sky danced at high speeds changed direction abrupt stops merged and blined out of sight in blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
I was stand on porch at 8:30 pm on 12/9/17.
i saw 10 to 15 red lights in a straight line.
i thought maybe planes or coppers or ufo's.
first time i saw that many but not my first, the first time was in 1965 ann arbor mi. again in 1971 same place.
they flew out of sight.
content.summary: Saw 10 to 15 red lights blinking but not off and on in a straight line moving

content.detailedDescription: Driving from billings back to laurel witnessed a strange aircraft formation heading south/southwest. they were flying very slowly ~20 red lights that were blinking on and off. very possibly could be helicopters though they seem to be flying very slow. roughly 3 miles away, very noticeable from interstate, maybe flying 1000 feet of the deck.
content.summary: Witnessed 20 red lights confirgured in semis straight formation  heading south very slowly

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were heading south on metcalf ave coming back from picking up a pizza from dominos pizza. i noticed a strings of red flashing lights across they sky straight in front of us. i pointed to it and my son finally noticed them as well. we were confused and didn't know what they could be. there were 10-14 red lights in a uniform line about 50-100 feet apart blinking on and off in synchronicity. they looked as if they were hovering but then we could tell they were heading west. we turned west onto 183rd st and stopped on the bridge over 69 hwy. i got out of the truck and recorder with my phone. my son gave me his phone to record as well. we were in shock and didn't know what to think of them. the red flashing lights would not show-up on the videos due to focusing issues etc. went home and told wife about encounter. turned on news to see if there was any other sightings. nothing. very exciting moment and certainly won't forget.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright flashing red lights going off and on in synchronicity spanning about 3/4 mile across. red lights were about 50 feet apart from one another. all were in uniform line across the sky flying west about 500-1000 ft above ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was in college, and dating a new boyfriend. just got home went to bed. was laying in bed with the blinds open pulled up so the whole window area was open. was staring up at the sky and noticed a bright light moving across the sky in a northerly direction. sky was clear and could see stars. the dallas-fort worth airport had been open about a year or so, and i thought maybe it was an airplane going to the new airport. then suddenly it stopped which i knew wasn't something an airplane could do. it hovered for about 10 seconds or so and then suddenly it shot up towards the east and mainly up really fast and was out of sight in maybe one and a half seconds. i jumped out of bed and went to the window and stared up hoping it would come back and it didn't. the window was about three feet from the bed. i think it was around 11 pm central us time.
content.summary: bright light moving slowly to north, stopped, hovered maybe 15 seconds, then shot up and east and out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
Me and the missus in the garden clear blue sky sun beaming. we were watching some big birds in the sky when this craft dropped out of the sky on front of my eyes, i kept my eyes on it the whole time.
it defended, sped up instantly, turned to the east at that speed with a flash of blue, and it was away into the distant east.
i knew what it was as soon as my eyes spotted it dropping out of the blue.
it enters the atmosphere from the south, heading north as it entered. i was looking east so i saw it side on for 7 seconds untill it made a 90° turn at amazon g speed and flash of blue light and shot of to the east. see pics please.
content.summary: The craft dropped out of the clear blue sky, dropped a bit like going downhill, sped up to an amazing speed, turned at this speed about 90° with a flash of blue and it shot off east.

content.detailedDescription: My brother sent me this picture he took on his way to work.  he said there were no other clouds in the sky.
content.summary: Crazy cloug

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to get firewood. cold clear night looked up and saw large line of 10/15 red/orange lights in the sky to my nw. they were not all blinking and not a formation iof planes i have seen before. looked on social media and several people also witnessed event.
content.summary: Large line of red/orange lights. not in a straight line but all offset. very close together

content.detailedDescription: I was at my aunts house,we were watching tv we heard a loud boom,and the house shook.We all three went on the front porch and we all looked to the left because the orange glow got our attention comming from the lower field.There wasa tree line between the house and lower field so we couldnt tell what the glow was caused by.We saw a orange orb fly over the tree tops from lower field and headed in our direction and decented 3 feet off ground  we were on a opened porch 4 feet high and when it got to the it raised up about 2 feet off floor and came across the porch real slow.We were standing 3 wide my aunt in middle,she held her arms out and directed us back to the wall saying watch out let this thing come by,as it came by it being so close we could have touched it.As it cleared porch floor it desended about 3 feet from the ground and continued though the yard and down into the woods. traveling not more than a slow walking speed. the next day my cousin and i went to the lower field and all of the grass was flattened in a strange pattern.Since than i have seen about 6 or more of these orbs a one time flying in a chasing like pattern.My 2 sons,brother and cousin all saw these orbs at the same time.
content.summary: It was a perfect round orange orb

content.detailedDescription: I study engineering at the university of limerick in ireland. i was walking from my accommodation to parkour training at the sports arena which started at 6:15pm. it was dark at the time and i could see the stars. about halfway there i noticed a pulse of light in the sky and presumed it was a shooting star so i looked up. then i saw the pulse again. naturally i presumed it was a plane and continued walking. then it occurred to me that the light i had seen had not been moving. i looked again and it had moved from a south east direction  to a south direction and appeared stationary there,over the campus. it had a white light which pulsed off occasionally. every time the white light pulsed on it would be accompanied by a faint red flash. i watched the light for several seconds. if i looked directly at it i only saw the lights but if i looked at it with my peripheral vision i think i could see a dark triangular shape. the white light appeared to be from the centre of this dark triangle. it was completely silent and completely stationary over the campus. i started to jog towards it but suddenly the light was gone and i couldn't see any trace of it anywhere.
content.summary: Walking from college dorm to gym. saw light flash in sky. saw triangular object with lights hover slowly over campus before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Looked like a meteor but was very bright for the daytime. also could have been a plane or middle in flames. i could not find any reports of anything natural.
content.summary: Looked like a huge meteor
